ygData.subject: Re: Fighting Without  A  Weapon (Becoming a real Bard)
ygData.msgSnippet: Congratulations, and welcome to the true bard community! =D I agree, it is very satisfying using the all instrument attack. Win a duel without even swinging a
ygData.messageBody:
Congratulations, and welcome to the true bard community! =D

I agree, it is very satisfying using the all instrument attack. Win a duel
without even swinging a fist and revel in the stunned silence you'll be met
with, heheh. It's not always a feasible tactic, though. Weapons and bellow
are still the best way to solo a caster, I've found. At least in the low
20's.

Operaman Overtone
Meandering Maestro of the 20th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk

> Take it from me, if you have never fought a mob using your instrament
> instead of weapons, you are missing the true feeling of being a bard
> (IMHO). I dont know if I will ever pick up another weapon.
>
> Clukey Lyricweaver, Bristlebane, 22nd Song
